title: cmd/godoc: generate import path for GOPATH packages
body:
If you have:

$HOME/golib/src/mylib/pkg1

and

export GOPATH=$HOME/golib

If you do:

godoc -http=:9000

and view in a browser you get a 'src' link and can follow that to reach pkg1's docs. But
the import line godoc shows is:

import "src/mylib/pkg1"

instead of

import "mylib/pkg1"
